changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER ( ID NUMBER(19,0) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, USERNAME VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, PASSWORD VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, FIRSTNAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, LASTNAME VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, INTERESTS VARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, CREATEDATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, UPDATEDATE DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE, ENABLED TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id) );
